you know frank, maybe making these boxes will be your FT calling. I bet that if you started looking for partners and financial backing that people would come out of the woodwork to back you. Putting these into production might be a good thing. Not to mention the people that would colaborate to help out with any design flaws.
  just a thought.

thing. I've been swamped with e-mail suince the C2C show last Thursday, I 
had to delete the e-mail link form my site.

Frank
